p: Nucleotide sequences of p1 genes of type 2f strain M282 and type 2g strain K708 were deposited into DDBJ/ENA/GenBank databases under the accession numbers LC311244 and LC385984, respectively. The sequences of the orf6 gene of strains M282 and K708 were deposited under the accession numbers LC390170 and LC420352, respectively. The sequence of the p1 operon of strain M241 was also deposited under the accession number LC390171.
